text: FC Ružinov Bratislava is a Slovak football team, based in the city of Bratislava in the part of city named Ružinov. The club was founded in 1919. ==References== == External links == * Category:Football clubs in Slovakia Category:Football clubs in Bratislava Category:Association football clubs established in 1919 Fc Ruzinov Bratislava
title: FC Ružinov Bratislava
